text.content: Learn to ease up a litttle, buddy !

text.content: Yashiro’s reasons for using me are pretty much the exact opposite of Hirata’s.

text.content: 矢代が俺を使う理由は平田とはまるで真逆だな

text.content: Hirata is an extremely dismal guy.

text.content: これは、形式主語の it が省略されており、「あなたと会うことはうれしいです」という意味になっている。

text.content: またお会いできてうれしいです。

text.content: He was still in his twenties, but had just put some group completely outta business.

rich_text.plain_text: He was still in his twenties, but had just put some group completely outta business.

text.content: まだ20代そこそこでどっかの組つぶしたってよ

text.content: No one dared to go hear him …

text.content: The guy got letters, but he’d always throw them out.

rich_text.plain_text: The guy got letters, but he’d always throw them out.

text.content: 手紙がきても開けもしねぇで捨ててたけどな

rich_text.plain_text: 手紙がきても開けもしねぇで捨ててたけどな

text.content: I can’t imagine what it would be like to be in prison, and not have any letters to read.

rich_text.plain_text: I can’t imagine what it would be like to be in prison, and not have any letters to read.

text.content: あそこで手紙を読まずにいられるのは俺には分からない

text.content: Oh ? You talkin’ from experience I never would have guessed.
